articles.title: K-pop stars Blackpink turn PUBG into a beautiful stage for new music video - The Verge
articles.description: As part of a collaboration with the video game PUBG Mobile, K-pop stars Blackpink have released a music video for the single “Ready For Love,” which is set in the game’s world.
articles.content: The band furthers their collaboration with PUBG Mobile on the single Ready For Love
